projects.title: Shorturl
projects.short: A link shortening service that tracks clicks and filters suspicious domains.
projects.description: Users can create custom branded short links, redirect visitors, and review real-time click analytics. It supports data export in JSON or CSV formats, while maintaining security through an admin-controlled domain blocking feature.

projects.title: Cinemarate
projects.short: A microservices-based application for movie rating and management.
projects.description: Cinemarate enables users to fetch, rate, and manage movie metadata through an API Gateway that translates REST requests to internal gRPC services. This project demonstrates patterns such as client-side discovery, aggregators, and the use of an API gateway as a single entry point.

projects.title: Book API
projects.short: A straightforward API for managing book data and collections.
projects.description: A RESTful API built with Go and Fiber. It implements a controller-repository pattern and supports CRUD operations, pagination, middleware, and MongoDB integration. The project features clean Go code structure and environment configuration via .env for easy maintenance.

projects.title: Book Tracking API
projects.short: A reading activity management system with layered access control and high-performance caching.
projects.description: A backend service to manage personal book catalogs and reading progress. This project served as a playground for implementing advanced security, including JWT authentication with Redis and precise Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to ensure data privacy.

projects.title: Serverless Mailer Service
projects.short: Automated message delivery service built on serverless architecture and Resend API integration.
projects.description: Bridging the communication gap between visitors and the site owner through serverless architecture. It utilizes Cloudflare Workers for instant, efficient message handling without server management, paired with Resend for secure and reliable email delivery.

projects.title: Parking CLI Tool
projects.short: A command-line parking management system featuring an interactive REPL mode.
projects.description: A terminal-based solution for managing parking slots, supporting both REPL and file-based input automation. The project focuses on data structure logic to accurately track capacity, vehicle status, and fee calculations.

projects.title: Stoccounting API
projects.short: A backend service for inventory and financial management systems.
projects.description: Stoccounting manages cash flow, purchases, and sales for retail businesses. It generates financial statements such as balance sheets and profit/loss reports, providing visualizations to monitor business health. Developed as part of a group academic project using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Notes Application
projects.short: A personal note-taking app featuring full-stack JavaScript integration.
projects.description: Connecting a responsive React interface with a Hapi Framework backend. This project emphasizes clean RESTful API implementation, client-side state management, and code standardization via ESLint. It served as a final project for a Dicoding certification course.

projects.title: Tanjung Raja Village Website
projects.short: Official profile website for Tanjung Raja Village to showcase local potential.
projects.description: Developed independently as part of the UGM KKN-PPM program in 2023. This initiative provided the village with its first official digital presence, using WordPress to build an informative, structured site optimized for SEO to improve visibility in search engines.

projects.title: Fadhil PortoNews
projects.short: A digital portfolio platform featuring a classic newspaper aesthetic and multi-language support.
projects.description: A design experiment delivering a vintage feel through modern technology. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, this site prioritizes both unique visuals and optimal performance, featuring i18n support to engage a global audience personally.
